entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Dryden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:39 a.m. EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
